title: DSAN "Evolution of Data Science" Conference, Poster Session

yaml.title: DSAN "Evolution of Data Science" Conference, Poster Session
yaml.subtitle:
Friday, September 8th, 5:00pm-6:00pm
Copley Lounge, Georgetown University

markdown.markdown:
The following posters will be presented during the poster session on **Friday, September 8th** from **5:00pm** to **6:00pm**. Congratulations to all selected authors!

You are expected to be present, with your poster, for the full session from 5:00pm to 6:00pm, in [**Copley Lounge**](https://goo.gl/maps/VTaDH14BYs5S9Guv8){target="_blank"} on Georgetown's campus. Attendance at the other sessions of the two-day conference is optional, but you are encouraged to attend, as the conference registration fee is waived for accepted poster presenters! We recommend business attire for all sessions.

You can use [FedEx's poster printing services](https://www.office.fedex.com/default/posters.html) to print the 24"-by-36" posters for the session. You only need to print the posters themsevles---easels for holding the posters will be set up and ready for you to use at the session! For more details see the [printing instructions page](printing.qmd), or the [FAQs page](faqs.qmd) for more general concerns! If anything you need is not covered there, please feel free to **email me** (Jeff Jacobs) at **[jj1088@georgetown.edu](mailto:jj1088@georgetown.edu){target="_blank"}**.

| Title | Author(s) |
|:- |:- |
| *Exploration of the Factors Affecting Salaries and Employment* | Wendi Chu and Tingsong Li |
| *Community Prediction with NLP: Text Classification Algorithms Using Reddit Data* | Victor De Lima and Matthew Moriarity |
| *DEFIYIELD: Exploitation of Open Blockchain Platforms* | Tegveer Ghura |
| *Data Analysis for GAD7 (Generalized Anxiety Disorder 7-item)* | Zeyu Han |
| *The Peltzman Effect in Action: Analyzing the Relationship Between Bike Lane Coverage and Cyclist Safety in New York City* | Wanying Li |
| *Unpacking the Factors Influencing Election Outcomes:  A Comprehensive Analysis* | Mike Liu |
| *Visualizing Success in the NFL: An Analysis of the National Football League* | Matthew Moriarity and Alex Pattarini |
| *A Visual Exploration of Walkability in Washington, D.C.* | Cynthia Ng and Valeria Vera Lagos |
| *Insights on Factors of World Happiness* | Yunhong Yang, Ziyue Li, Yutao Chen, and Xiaodan Lu |

: {tbl-colwidths="[75, 25]"}
